thread.title: Russia's revenue of Chinese tourists hit USD1b in 2014
thread.title_full: Russia's revenue of Chinese tourists hit USD1b in 2014 | MENAFN.COM

title: Russia's revenue of Chinese tourists hit USD1b in 2014
text:
(MENAFN) Russia is expected to earn more revenue from Chinese tourists who spent USD1 billion in the country last year helped by a devalued ruble amid Western sanctions, Xinhua reported.

Chinese tourists accounted for 16 percent of all foreign tourists in Russia since the start of 2015. Meanwhile, the average amount spent by Chinese tourists on a trip touches USD2,400, GfK data showed.

"The rising of the middle-income-class in China can explain Chinese tourists' big-spending habits. They pursue luxury jewelry and clothes instead of Russian dolls," director of the Center for Chinese Strategic Studies said.
